signs.movement_description: Bring the 'B' hand towards the mouth in a short arc, repeating the motion a few times as if putting food in your mouth.
signs.non_manual_signals: Neutral, may involve slight mouth movement.
signs.source_description: Move the 'B' hand up towards the mouth a few times.

signs.movement_description: Bring the 'L' hand towards the mouth in a short arc, repeating the motion a few times.
signs.non_manual_signals: Neutral, may involve slight mouth movement.
signs.source_description: Move the 'L' hand up towards the mouth a few times.

signs.movement_description: Bring the 'S' hand towards the mouth in a short arc, repeating the motion a few times.
signs.non_manual_signals: Neutral, may involve slight mouth movement.
signs.source_description: Move the 'S' hand toward the mouth a few times.

signs.movement_description: Bring the 'F' hand towards the mouth in a short arc, repeating the motion a few times.
signs.non_manual_signals: Neutral, may involve slight mouth movement.
signs.source_description: Move the 'F' hand toward the mouth a few times.

signs.movement_description: Bring the flattened 'AND' hand (fingertips together) to the mouth and tap it lightly a few times.
signs.non_manual_signals: Neutral, may involve slight mouth movement.
signs.source_description: Move the 'AND' hand toward the mouth a few times.

signs.movement_description: Form a 'C' hand as if holding a cup. Bring it to your mouth and tilt it upward in a short arc, mimicking the action of drinking.
signs.source_description: Tilt the 'C' hand in a short arc toward the mouth.
